pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models

Class DecimalNumeralSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models.NumeralSystem
      • pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models.DecimalNumeralSystem

  • public class DecimalNumeralSystem
extends NumeralSystem
    Class representing decimal numeral system and implementing methods used for computing decimal system from/to other numeral systems.

      Converts passed number from decimal system to the NumeralSystem identified by passed NumeralSystem implementation object.

      Gets decimal system full name

      • convertToSpecifiedNumSystem

        public java.lang.String convertToSpecifiedNumSystem(java.lang.String numberToConvert,
                                                    NumeralSystem outputNumeralSystem)
        Converts passed number from decimal system to the NumeralSystem identified by passed NumeralSystem implementation object.
        Specified by:
        convertToSpecifiedNumSystem in class NumeralSystem
        Parameters:
        numberToConvert - number to convert from decimal to other numeral system
        outputNumeralSystem - instance of NumeralSystem which represents output numeral system.
        Returns:
        passed number representation in numeral system identified by outputNumeralSystem argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - when detected illegal characters in number to convert
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when any of parameters is null

        Converts passed integer number (in decimal system) to the decimal system.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        numberToConvert - number in decimal system which we want to convert to decimal system.
        Returns:
        input integer number converted to the decimal system.
